__e: We had searched the woods near the campground and what we found was a human heart.
Or how about the time your dad put a possum in your tent during a camping trip and you literally jumped out of your skin?
What? And I realized how much I love this man here. And that no matter what happened,
As long as I can do it in the warmth and safety of this nice motor home.
Anyway, I didn't want a problem with that crazy guy, so I told him where to go, but I called it in right away. I told them, "Better move the RV."
Because you're too young to spend the night with your boyfriend in some camper in a parking lot somewhere.
